gazin_atacado_b2b.projectDescription: Between 2022 and 2024, I took part in building Gazin Atacado’s B2B e-commerce platform from scratch. I contributed to architectural decisions, reusable component development, and microservices integration with ERP and sales gateways.
gazin_atacado_b2b.responsibilitiesDescription: Project foundation, development of microservices, modeling sales rules, creating scalable components with Next.js + Chakra UI, integration with internal APIs, and sales funnel optimization.
gazin_atacado_b2b.projectImpactDescription: The B2B platform reduced operational costs, automated sales processes, eliminated manual failures, and increased wholesale order conversions.

gazin_atacado_erp.projectDescription: Central ERP system for sales, KPIs, logistics, and billing. I worked on the project for 4 years, maintaining legacy modules and driving the migration to microservices using Clean Architecture.
gazin_atacado_erp.responsibilitiesDescription: Legacy refactoring (PHP 5.2 → 8.1), rewriting critical modules, optimization of heavy database operations using Oracle PL/SQL (CTEs, indexing, tuning), microservice-based architecture planning, and standardization of new APIs.
gazin_atacado_erp.projectImpactDescription: Reduced slow queries from minutes to seconds, increased scalability, and accelerated development by enabling modularization through isolated services.

gazin_industria.projectDescription: System responsible for production control and manufacturing orders in Gazin's industrial plants. Built in PHP 8.2 using Slim as a microframework.
gazin_industria.responsibilitiesDescription: Development of new routines, maintenance of critical business rules, optimization of Oracle PL/SQL queries, integration with other internal systems (ERP and logistics), and backend stability improvements.
gazin_industria.projectImpactDescription: Improved reliability of industrial processes, reduced operational failures, and increased traceability throughout the production flow.

go_rate_limiter.projectDescription: Middleware capable of limiting requests by IP/token, returning HTTP 429, and temporarily blocking requests.
go_rate_limiter.responsibilitiesDescription: Middleware implementation, Redis storage, environment-based configuration, Dockerfile, tests, and documentation.
go_rate_limiter.projectImpactDescription: Showcases backend architectural skills, concurrency control, and scalable API best practices.

go_auction_system.projectDescription: Backend auction system using goroutines to monitor lot expiration and update status automatically.
go_auction_system.responsibilitiesDescription: Goroutine orchestration, PostgreSQL transactions, tests, structured logs, and clean architecture.
go_auction_system.projectImpactDescription: Demonstrates real usage of concurrency, scalability, and async jobs in production environments.

mfa_service.projectDescription: Single authentication MFA service used by multiple systems, centralizing token generation and validation.
mfa_service.responsibilitiesDescription: Integration with external APIs (via Guzzle), Redis for TTL/cache, decoupled architecture using clean architecture.
mfa_service.projectImpactDescription: Reduced duplication of authentication logic among systems and increased overall security.
